flawed_nl_solution:
In 10 years, Kilee will be 20 years + 10 years = 50 years.
In ten years, Cornelia will be 3 * 50 years = <<3*50=150>>150 years old.
Cornelia is currently 150 years - 10 years = <<150-10=140>>140 years old
#### 140

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 30, not 50. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
